text: Douglas Brian "Pete" Peterson (born June 26, 1935) is an American politician. He was a United States Air Force pilot during the Vietnam War. He became the first United States Ambassador to Vietnam in 1997. He was an ambassador until July 2001. Peterson was also a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1991 until 1997 for Florida's 2nd congressional district. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:American aviators Category:American philanthropists Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Military people from Nebraska
